Literature.Title: NOVEL ANTI-MICROBIAL PEPTIDOMIMETIC COMPOUNDS AND METHODS TO CALCULATE ANTI-MICROBIAL ACTIVITY
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Venugopal D, Bhonsle JB

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=30µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=10µM),Mycobacterium fortuitum ATCC 110(MIC=30µM),Francisella tularensis SCHU-S4(MIC=250µg/ml),Bacillus anthracis Ames(MIC=1.95µg/ml),Brucella melitensis 16M(MIC=>500µg/ml),Yersinia pestis C092(MIC=15.6µg/ml)
